column5: Last Sunday...     Thursday morning...      Saturday afternoon (very foggy)

Taites Bay...              The south wind is pushing the ice against the north shore...  From the big bridge in town it looks like open water from the mouth of the river clear over to Big Island...  Too foggy to take any pics Saturday...doesn't look like much change from above pics...I'll wait a few more days...
Hey stay away from there! Lol
Well look what the good weather brought out.  Looking forward to seeing you this spring Tony. I hope you have been putting a beating on the rainbows.
I plan on checking over at...er...um...you know on Saturday !
Bumped re: new pic above in first post and comment in second...

Headed over to the cottage on northeast arm of Pigeon.  Still iced up as far as I could see thru the fog.  Gannon Narrows wide open.  Water levels on Pigeon still low -about 1 ft down from summer  Scugog looked wide open from the causeway  peter
Still iced up over on your shore Peter  Taites Bay today...A good stiff north wind should push it down the back channel...Nogies Bay is wide open...
